name: pnp-powerplatform-snippets-layout-funnel
title: Layout Funnel
shortDescription: This is a simple snippet that can help you get started with creating a screen in canvas app. It is a set of containers with various number of columns.
longDescription: This is a simple snippet that can help you get started with creating a screen in canvas app. It is a set of containers with various number of columns. The first container has 4 columns, the second container has 3 columns, the third container has 2 columns, and the fourth container has 1 column.
